title: Steve Curry is supposed to have been spread by Nike over the Bible's parentheses.
subtitle: The social media leaflets and articles claimed (without supporting evidence) that Nike did not sign a gold basketball star Steve Corey's endorsement deal because he insisted on putting a Bible verse on his sports shoes.
author: Dan Evon
vclaim: Nikki didn't sign Steve Corey because the NBA star insisted on putting a Bible on his shoes.
